description: A small trinket that widens a weapon's projectiles. This makes it much easier to hit small targets.
A small trinket that breaks a weapon's projectiles into many pieces. This effectively turns anything into a shotgun.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to create a small cloud of smoke at their target.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to leave behind a trail of smoke.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to leave behind a trail of fire.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to tangle their target in vines.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to blind upon headshot.
A small trinket that puts extra lead in a weapon's projectiles, causing them to stun on impact.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to explode into a pool of acid upon impact.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to flare on impact, lighting targets on fire.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to ride lightning.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to bounce.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to leave a plasma trail behind them.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to keep their victims intact.
A small trinket that causes a weapon's projectiles to avoid damaging any object except your target.
A small trinket with a radioactive warning symbol on it.
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, infuses it's projectiles with a tiny amount of heat damage(+1).
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, infuses it's projectiles with a tiny amount of cold damage(+1).
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, infuses it's projectiles with a tiny amount of electric damage(+1).
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, infuses it's projectiles with a tiny amount of acid damage(+1).
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, infuses it's projectiles with a tiny amount of biological damage(+1).
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, increases it's handling by a tiny amount (+1).
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, reduces it's weight by a tiny amount (-%10).
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, increases it's range by a tiny amount (+5).
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, decreases time to reload by a tiny amount (-%10).
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, makes it fire two shots per trigger pull.
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, reduces it's dispersion by a tiny amount (-5).
A small trinket that, when attached to a weapon, increases it's aim speed by a tiny amount.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to add a small amount of heat damage (+3) to projectiles fired. Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to add a small amount of cold damage (+3) to projectiles fired. Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to add a small amount of acidic damage (+3) to projectiles fired. Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to add a small amount of electrical damage (+3) to projectiles fired. Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to add a small amount of biological damage (+3) to projectiles fired. Aside from increased weight, there are no drawbacks.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to reduce weight by a small amount (-%20). There are no drawbacks.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to increase handling by a small amount (+3). There are no drawbacks.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to reduce dispersion by a small amount (-10). There are no drawbacks.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to reduce reload time by a small amount (-%20). There are no drawbacks.
A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to make it fire three shots per trigger pull.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to increase range by a small amount (+7). There are no drawbacks.

A small visible-light laser that mounts on a firearm's accessory rail to enhance ease and speed of target acquisition. This one also uses magitech to increase aim speed by a small amount (+20). There are no drawbacks.

The Long Arms Near Combat Enhancer is a carbon fiber, magitech-enhanced bayonet that simply outperforms a normal bayonet in every way due to it's patented vortex design. It is lightweight and projects a holographic spike in order to extend it's melee range without additional weight.
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel and as such applies heat damage to it's projectiles (+5).
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel and as such applies cold damage to it's projectiles (+5).
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel and as such applies electric damage to it's projectiles (+5).
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel and as such applies acid damage to it's projectiles (+5).
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel and as such applies biological damage to it's projectiles (+5).
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel to hyperfractally correct bullet trajectories and as such increases handling (+15).
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel to attract ammunition and as such reduces reload time (-%40).

A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel to steal energy from the future and as such makes it fire four times per trigger pull.
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel to dimensionally displace it and as such reduces it's weight (-%40).
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel to store potential energy and as such increases it's range (+12).
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel to universally 'rifle' the projectile and as such reduces bullet dispersion (-15).
A grip placed forward on the barrel allows for greater control. This one holographically interfaces with the barrel to universally 'rifle' the projectile and as such could increase aim speed.

Magitech from one of the sea of nameless corporations looking for some military money. A 'bad brake' underperforms as a muzzle brake but was used extensively by military and law enforement for it's effectiveness in the magical realm. This one fractal-holographically enhances projectiles by infusing them with heat damage (+12).

This one fractal-holographically enhances the weapon's aim speed (+40).

An advanced optic that envelops the entire weapon with a hologram reticle superimposed on the field of view, fractal calculations enhancing target acquisition.  Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also heating up projectiles as they exit the barrel to deal heat damage (+12).

An advanced optic that envelops the entire weapon with a hologram reticle superimposed on the field of view, fractal calculations enhancing target acquisition.  Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also heating up projectiles as they exit the barrel to deal heat damage (+16).

An advanced optic that envelops the entire weapon with a hologram reticle superimposed on the field of view, fractal calculations enhancing target acquisition.  Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also cooling down projectiles as they exit the barrel to deal cold damage (+16).

Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also electrifying projectiles as they exit the barrel to deal electrical damage (+16).

Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also applying an anti-organic compound to the projectiles as they exit the barrel to deal biological damage (+16).

An advanced optic that envelops the entire weapon with a hologram reticle superimposed on the field of view, fractal calculations enhancing target acquisition.  Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also applying an anti-organic compound to the projectiles as they exit the barrel to deal biological damage (+16).

An enhanced 'holographic' sight that uses extra-dimensional magitech to holographically project the weapon's pieces into our reality as is necessary, reducing it's weight to almost nothing (-%90). Used extensively by military forces, it also increases accuracy.

An enhanced 'holographic' sight that uses extra-dimensional magitech to shunt energy from the muzzle into another space, reducing recoil greatly (-20). Used extensively by military forces, it also increases accuracy and weight.

An enhanced 'holographic' sight that uses extra-dimensional magitech to reduce distance to target via wormhole, greatly increasing range (+20). Used extensively by military forces, it also increases accuracy and weight.

An enhanced 'holographic' sight that uses extra-dimensional magitech to predict and divert potentially reload-disrupting incidents. Greatly reduces reload time (-%75). Used extensively by military forces, it also increases accuracy and weight.

An enhanced 'holographic' sight that uses extra-dimensional magitech to create extra 'blowback' forces and then redirect them into the mechanism, artificially making it fire six times per trigger pull. Used extensively by military forces, it also increases accuracy.

An enhanced 'holographic' sight that uses extra-dimensional magitech to manually oppose external forces on bullets fired, greatly reducing dispersion (-50). Used extensively by military forces, it also increases accuracy.

An enhanced 'holographic' sight that uses extra-dimensional magitech to identify potential enemy positions, greatly increasing aim speed (+50). Used extensively by military forces, it also increases accuracy.

A highly technological, holographic chamber that encases the pre-existing chamber and bore of a revolver. It interfaces with bullets fired to create a holographic 'shell' that increases force of impact. Essentially, it makes your bullets bigger.

A magnetic device that attaches easily to the side of almost any shotgun. It is designed to identify incoming shells and magnetically redirect them to simplify the reloading process. It makes reloading a breeze.

A clump of a gelatin-like substance that rougly forms the shape of a glove. The glove grips the handle of a pistol perfectly, with a little time to sink in. It takes control of the weapon and influences the wielder's muscle movements to increase aim speed and handling dramatically.

A small, smooth rod that floats inside of pneumatic weapons. Somehow, it knows it's place. Once installed it interferes with the action, redirecting projectiles to avoid potential obstacles. It decreases disperison immensely.
A small multicolored ball like what comes out of a machine in exchange for a quarter. Put it near a slingshot and watch things fly.
